title: School Bans U.S. Flag T-Shirts on Cinco de Mayo
subtitle: Rumor: A federal court upheld a ruling that school officials acted correctly in requiring students to remove clothing featuring U.S. flag designs on Cinco de Mayo.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A federal court upheld a ruling that school officials acted correctly in requiring students to remove clothing featuring U.S. flag designs on Cinco de Mayo.
